chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
y: pos n
x: pos n
Hxy: x <> y
q: nat
p: nat
i: nat
x': pos n

Goal:
length compare_stacks = 10

Premises:
compare_stacks = POP x (4 + i) (7 + i) :: POP y q q :: PUSH x Zero :: POP x i i :: POP y i q :: PUSH y Zero :: POP y q i :: POP y q p :: PUSH x' Zero :: POP x' q q :: nil : list (bsm_instr n)
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Notation pos := Fin.t
copy_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> v#>z = nil -> w = v[(l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, copy_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (16 + i, w)
Fin.eq_dec : forall x0 y0 : pos ?n, {x0 = y0} + {x0 <> y0} where ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- nat]
copy_rev_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y][(rev l ++ v#>z)/z] -> (i, copy_rev_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (9 + i, w)
Fin.FS_inj : forall x0 y0 : pos ?n, pos_nxt x0 = pos_nxt y0 -> x0 = y0 where ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (w : vec ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- Type]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p0 q0 : pos ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q0) -> p0 = q0 where ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q0 : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q0} where ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- nat]
empty_stack_length : forall (x : pos n) (i : nat), length (empty_stack x i) = 3
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- Type]
length_move_rev_stack : forall (x y : pos n) (i : nat), length (move_rev_stack x y i) = 7
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p0 : pos ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p0)) = p0 where ?m : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- nat]
length_copy_rev_stack : forall (x y z : pos n) (i : nat), length (copy_rev_stack x y z i) = 9
copy_stack_length : forall (x y z : pos n) (i : nat), length (copy_stack x y z i) = 16
BinInt.Z.le = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
move_rev_stack_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, move_rev_stack x y i) // (i, v) -> > (7 + i, w)
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- Type]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- Type]
repeat_length : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (n : nat), length (repeat x n) = n
list_repeat_length : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (n : nat), length (list_repeat x n) = n
Permutation.Permutation_nth : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (d : A), l ~p l' < -> (let n := length l in length l' = n /\ (exists f : nat -> nat, FinFun.bFun n f /\ FinFun.bInjective n f /\ (forall x : nat, x < n -> nth x l' d = nth (f x) l d)))
pos_eq_dec : forall (n : nat) (x y : pos n), {x = y} + {x <> y}
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- nat]
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v : vec ?A (S ?n)) (P : vec ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : vec ?A ?n), P (h ## t)) -> P v where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat p : nat q : nat x' := x : pos n |- nat]
vec_one_spec_neq : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), p <> q -> vec_one p#>q = 0
nth_ext : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (d d' : A), length l = length l' -> (forall n : nat, n < length l -> nth n l d = nth n l' d') -> l = l'
nth_error_Some : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat), nth_error l n <> None < -> n < length l
list_pick : forall (X : Type) (ll : list X) (k : nat), k < length ll -> {x : X & {l : list X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ x :: r /\ length l = k}}}
partition_length : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> length l = length l1 + length l2
app_length : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), length (l ++ l') = length l + length l'
